trans-unit.target: Have fun planning your child's future
Share your ideas and learn new tips

Plan the education of your child
  • Each parent can tailor the platform to match their vision of education
  • Stay in control of what you give access to your child
  • Improve your child curiosity by giving interesting choices to explore
  • Identify and prevent passivity like watching TV, youtube or playing bad quality games

Share popular education tips
  • Read about how to best ensure your child's success
  • See statistics about recommended age to access digital contents
  • Share your ideas with the community
  • Other family members can also contribute

Imagine multiple paths
  • Build multiple paths for your child to explore
  • Give positive incentives for your child to try new things
  • Write time capsule messages for your child to read in the future
  • Cherry pick a few quality photos every month
Path of child is a gamification platform for planning the life and education of your children. You can have fun and share useful information with other family members and parents.
Prepare the child for the path, not the path for the child.
Want to give us a feedback?
Path of child Terms of Service

TLDR
  • I'm a person, not a company.
  • I live in London so we are under UK law.
  • The data is hosted mostly in the Amazon UK datacenter.
  • I use the best tools to protect your data.
  • I'm using this website for my personal use first and foremost.
  • The service is free, I'm paying for everything.
  • Feel free to join the fun. It's an experiment.
  • You can find me on LinkedIn
  • This platform source code is open source on WTFPL license and hosted on GitHub

Last updated: March 25, 2018
